projects.title: Building functional and interactive websites!
projects.description: As a freelancer, I have a diverse portfolio of projects that I have worked on. I have a strong track record of taking on clients' websites, and delivering high-quality results. My responsibilities include redesigning, maintaining, updating and fixing bugs on different website projects. I have experience in understanding the clients needs and suggesting solutions to help them achieve their business objectives. As a skilled developer, I am able to work on different web technology stacks and CMSs, adapting to the specific needs of each project. This allows me to provide my clients with a professional, high-performing website that meets their unique requirements.

projects.title: Survey consumers to know which products will sell best.
projects.description: For this project, I was tasked with building a Shopify web app that pulls store data for processing. I also worked on the client's Webflow site handling maintenance and setuping a REST api to improve workflow.
